alert.note: Alert for Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 22 at 4:05PM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Schoharie, Western Schenectady, Western Albany and Western Greene Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates between a half inch and one inch per hour are possible tonight into Monday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Schenectady
